thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Sunday, 04 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Plans Share Private Placement For Acquisition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Plans Share Private Placement For Acquisition

organizations.name: reuters) - zhejiang wanfeng auto wheel co ltd

text:
March 4 (Reuters) - Zhejiang Wanfeng Auto Wheel Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT PLANS TO RAISE 500 MILLION YUAN ($78.83 million) TO 1.5 BILLION YUAN IN SHARE PRIVATE PLACEMENT TO FUND ACQUISITION TO BUY 51 PERCENT STAKE IN AUTO PARTS FIRM
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO HALT FROM MARCH 5 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2oOmvdS Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3428 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
